description: ServiceAccountRestriction matches a service account by a string match on either the service-account name or the name of the service account's namespace.

items.description: ServiceAccountReference specifies a service account and namespace by their names.

namespace.description: Namespace is the namespace of the service account.  Service accounts from inside the whitelisted namespaces are allowed to be bound to roles.  If Namespace is empty, then the namespace of the RoleBindingRestriction in which the ServiceAccountReference is embedded is used.

name.description: Name is the name of the service account.

serviceaccounts.description: ServiceAccounts specifies a list of literal service-account names.

namespaces.description: Namespaces specifies a list of literal namespace names.
